document.full_text: on a rainy night when the game started 1 hour and 20 minutes late because of poor field conditions, mets manager terry collins summed up the night: 'uncomfortable from start to finish, no doubt.'
document.title: marlins 2, mets 1 (11 innings): mets score early run against marlins' ace, but none off their bullpen
lines_and_colors: on a rainy night when the game started 1 hour and 20 minutes late because of poor field conditions, mets manager terry collins summed up the night: 'uncomfortable from start to finish, no doubt.'
